imdb.plot outline: Jesus is kicked out of heaven by his father, God, after he gets too comfy with his life and slacks on his responsibilities. God thinks by sending Jesus back to earth it will help him learn more responsibility and will teach him how to take care of himself. On Jesus' journey to rediscovery, he handles the hardships of being a socialite in Hollywood, having a messy roommate, and overall just trying to save all of our doomed souls.
imdb.title: What If God Was One of Us?
akas: What If God Was One of Us? (United States)
plot: Jesus is kicked out of heaven by his father, God, after he gets too comfy with his life and slacks on his responsibilities.
